# Technical Specification (TS)

## Project Title:
[Insert project name]

## Prepared By:
[Your name or team]

## Date:
[MM/DD/YYYY]

---

## 1. Architecture Overview
Describe the system structure and flow.

## 2. Technology Stack
- Language: [e.g., C#]
- Framework: [.NET 6+]
- Dependencies: [List]

## 3. Module Responsibilities
| Module | Responsibility |
|--------|----------------|
| Program.cs | CLI orchestration |
| Logger.cs | Logging actions and errors |

## 4. Data Flow
Describe how data moves through the system.

## 5. File Structure
List key files and directories.

## 6. Logging Standards
- Severity levels
- Timestamp format
- Correlation ID usage

## 7. Extensibility Notes
- How to add new scenarios or modules
